content.rendered:
[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” crypterium_vc_row_jarallax=”yes” el_id=”intro” p_img=”5497″ crypterium_vc_row_jarallax_speed=”0.3″][vc_column]

AFFILIATE PROGRAM

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class=”af-register”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”BECOME A LUX TRADING FIRM AFFILIATE PARTNER” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_custom_heading text=”Do you have an engaging trading audience? The Lux Trading Firm Affiliate Program offers commissions for affiliates who refer their traders to The Lux Career Trading Program (We can only approve affiliate partners who can prove they are the owner or admin from the website or social media page/group related to online trading).” font_container=”tag:h6|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes”]

Gain access to leading tracking software – Co-marketing opportunities and exclusive discounts for your audience – Dedicated affiliate team to assist you with promotion and strategy – Influencer opportunities.

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class=”af-register” css=”.vc_custom_1618050037186{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_column_text]
Register a new affiliate account

Log into your account

Lost your password?

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
